content: The fact that I have to explain my behaviour is deeply upsetting. I feel a visceral resistance to addressing any aspect of this mess, but I also know that moving from resistance to acceptance requires a constant acknowledgement of each thought related to that internal pull of repulsion. In other words, it’s not about pretending things didn’t happen, and it’s not about trying to just ‘let it go’. Quite the contrary, moving from resistance to acceptance requires the repeated act of sitting with the emotional and mental chaos, meeting each retaliation head on, and giving each thought space to express itself.
